alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 1:41AM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Northeasterly winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...East Sweetwater County including Interstate 80 between Rock Springs and Wamsutter. * WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute and Thanksgiving Travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...he heaviest snow and strongest wind is likely to occur between 3 PM Thanksgiving and sunrise Friday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
